## paste to excel
```{r}

write.excel <- function(x,row.names=FALSE,col.names=TRUE,...) {
  write.table(x,"clipboard",sep="\t",row.names=row.names,col.names=col.names,...)
}

write.excel(table)

```

## not include

```{r}
`%!in%` = Negate(`%in%`)
```
